name: Protect (Minitsonga)
description:
Here is my first game that will be published on Epic Game or Steam.

"PROTECT" is a 2D game with 3 modes : 

  • Endless : Upgrade your weapon be destroy asteroids and reaching next levels
  • Survival : Survive the longest you can with different difficulty modes ( Easy, Nomal , Hard)
  • (MAYBY TRAINING) : you will be able to train yourself with the physic of the ship
